mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.COMMENT , A.SCORE , A.EVENT_ID FROM TBL_REVIEW A JOIN TBL_EVENT B ON (A.EVENT_ID = B.ID) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ customerId } AND A.ID < #{ lastReviewId } ORDER BY A.ID DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.COMMENT , A.SCORE , A.EVENT_ID FROM TBL_REVIEW A JOIN TBL_EVENT B ON (A.EVENT_ID = B.ID) WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = #{ companyId } AND A.ID < #{ lastReviewId } ORDER BY A.ID DESC LIMIT 10
